    me.schlaubi.commandcord.core  

    • Uses of CommandManagerBuilder in me.schlaubi.commandcord.core

      Methods in me.schlaubi.commandcord.core that return CommandManagerBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CommandManagerBuilder CommandManagerBuilder.authorIsAdmin(boolean enable)
      Gives bot auhtors admin rights for every command on all servers
      CommandManagerBuilder CommandManagerBuilder.deleteCommandMessages(int deleteTime)
      Deletes bot's response to command
      CommandManagerBuilder CommandManagerBuilder.deleteInvokeMessages(boolean enable)
      Deleted messages that invokes commands
      CommandManagerBuilder CommandManagerBuilder.enableBlacklist(boolean enable)
      Enabled blacklist
      CommandManagerBuilder CommandManagerBuilder.enableGuildPrefixes(boolean useGuildPrefixes)
      Enabled guild specific prefixes
      CommandManagerBuilder CommandManagerBuilder.enableMultiThreading(boolean enable)
      Enables that every command will be run in a new Thread
      CommandManagerBuilder CommandManagerBuilder.enableTyping(boolean enable)
      Enables the sendTyping method before every command
      CommandManagerBuilder CommandManagerBuilder.setApi(java.lang.Object api)
      Sets the Discord api wrapper which is needed to get guild information
      CommandManagerBuilder CommandManagerBuilder.setBeforeTasksHandler(BeforeTasks beforeTasksHandler)
      Enabled task that were run before every command
      CommandManagerBuilder CommandManagerBuilder.setBlacklistProvider(BlackListProvider blacklistProvider)
      Sets blacklist provider (is necessary to use blacklist)
      CommandManagerBuilder CommandManagerBuilder.setDefaultPrefix(java.lang.String defaultPrefix)
      Sets the default prefix
      CommandManagerBuilder CommandManagerBuilder.setPermissionProvider(PermissionProvider permissionProvider)
      Sets the provider for permissions
      CommandManagerBuilder CommandManagerBuilder.setPrefixProvider(PrefixProvider prefixProvider)
      Sets the provider for prefixes
